posts.name: Yishai Levy
posts.cooked:
Last time we used it, the router worked fine and was configured with the latest VH-109 Access Point firmware (for FMS like usage). Now, it’s lighting up, solid power light, blank Sys light, and rio light on (though no rio is connected). A computer doesn’t recognize connection when connected to it via a wire. Also, all the Ethernet ports light up, even though no Ethernet cable is connected to most of them. Any clue why might this be happening, and how one could solve this? IMG_20241009_145300 1920×2560 99.3 KB (Picture for reference, stuck like that for multiple minutes already)

IMG_20241009_145300 1920×2560 99.3 KB

IMG_20241009_145300 1920×2560 99.3 KB

posts.name: Yishai Levy
posts.cooked: @kiettyyyy sorry for the ping, but might you have an idea on what to do?

posts.name: Kiet Chau
posts.cooked: Sounds like it might actually have a fault. I PM’d you to see what you did/firmware loaded, etc.
